p: Another point that deserves mention here is neonates of COVID-19-positive mothers. Although anecdotal reports exist, there is no direct evidence about the vertical transmission of SARS-CoV-2 from mother to child [ 56]. Chen et al. detected no virus in amniotic fluid, umbilical cord blood, and breast milk samples from mothers with COVID-19 and pharynx swabs of neonates born to mothers with COVID-19 [ 57].
